| History                 = The Kamchatkan Liberation Movement was a separatist organization, seeking to establish an autonomous or independent state in the [[Union of Soviet Socialist Republics|Soviet Union]]. It consisted of former soldiers, a force of 20,000 well-trained and armed soldiers. Who were being led by [[Xandiaong Urt (Earth-616)|General Urt]], an aspiring warlord. It had been fighting the Soviets for 5 years, financing themselves with money generated from the drug and arms trade. 

The Kamchatkan Liberation Movement had taken over an oil refinery at Krosnki that spread out over 4.2 sq km and were supporting the eco-terrorists of [[Humans Off Planet (Earth-616)|Humans Off Planet]]. Who believed the ex-Soviets were supporting them do to HOP being socialists, when in reality their goal was for HOP to destroy the Alaskan oil pipeline thereby increasing their profits from the Krosnki oil refinery.{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 31|33}}
